stimulusHtml: The uniform rod of length L shown above is supported by holding end X so that the rod makes an angle 60Â° with the horizontal floor. There is no friction acting between the rod and the floor. When the support at X is removed, the rod falls under the influence of gravity. Which of the following best describes the movement of end Y as the rod falls?
choicesHtml: It moves  1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AE0@ L to the left.

It moves  1 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AE2@ L to the right.

It moves  1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AE0@ L to the right.

It moves  3 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AE4@ L to the right.
